oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Original wills, Altemeyer, Mrs. M. T., 1909 October 25
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: An original will of Mrs. M. T. Altemeyer, dated February 4th, 1909. Illustrates the first page of the document. Altemeyer’s will was presented for probate to the Davidson County Court on October 25th, 1909. Forms part of Record Group 16, Original Wills, 1780-1925.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Altemeyer family
